document_data.title: Menace of the Icy Spire
document_data.author: [[M. Sean Molley|Sean Molley]]
document_data.Synopsis: In [[Eleasis]] of [[1479 DR]], a group of [[adventurer]]s is hired to investigate the unseasonably cold weather in the [[Gray Vale]]. Local leaders in [[Loudwater]] suspect this is a [[magical]] phenomenon emanating from the tower of the [[dwarf|dwarven]] [[warlock]] [[Draigdurroch]], who disappeared thirty years ago. The adventurers must investigate [[Draigdurroch Tower]], overcoming [[frost goblin]]s, [[ice warrior]]s, and a [[spirit of winter]] itself along the way.
